    • setObjectiveCommonEXEC

      public boolean setObjectiveCommonEXEC(CommonObj o1, CommonObj o2) throws MatchExeception
      Set the common objective, by checking if they are different
      Parameters:
      o1 - CommonOBJ
      o2 - CommonOBJ
      Returns:
      True if they are different, False otherwise
      Throws:
      MatchExeception

      public CommonObj getCommonOBJ1()

      public static void pointSetter(int objCount, Player nowPlaying)
      assign public point to current player
      Parameters:
      objCount - how many people made this goal
      nowPlaying - who made the goal

    • personalOBJChooser

      public PersonalObj personalOBJChooser() throws MatchExeception
      Random select the personal goal
      Returns:
      personal goal
      Throws:
      MatchExeception - if random fails

    • newPlayer

      public void newPlayer(String nick) throws MatchExeception
      Handle the joining of a new player in the game. If the list of player is empty the commonOBJ will be generated. If the player is the second one joining the lobby it will be marked as second for endgame logic
      Parameters:
      nick - of player
      Throws:
      MatchExeception - some error occurs on personal or common objective appear or Max Player, but those are quite impossible

    • setupPlayground

      public void setupPlayground()
      Just initialize playground with the prefixed player size

    • newTurn

      public int newTurn(int column, Vector<Tiles> picked) throws RuntimeException
      Handle new turn, by rotating the queue and interrogating the model, if some error occur in the model it will abort the turn and notify this to gamehandler that will abort the phase
      Parameters:
      column - in which column should appear the tiles
      picked - tiles picked
      Returns:
      0 if everything went well, 1 otherwise
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if some error occur while pickup

    • resetPlayers

      public void resetPlayers()
      This is used to reset the queue in case of miss handling of the turn before, it will be called by the gameHandler after the abortion

    • getP

      public Playground getP()
      get playground
      Returns:
      Playground

    • getLastPlayer

      public Player getLastPlayer()
      Return who played last, thrown is used to know if the previous instruction was aborted or not, because if was aborted we need to pick the first
      Returns:
      player, the first in the queue if there is an abort in the turn, the last in the queue otherwise

    • getPlayer

      public LinkedList<Player> getPlayer()
      Return all player
      Returns:
      players

    • getThisPlayer

      public Player getThisPlayer(String nick)
      This will do a search into the players queue by the nickname
      Parameters:
      nick - , it's the search key
      Returns:
      the requested user

    • getNowPlaying

      public Player getNowPlaying()
      This will return the player who has to make is his turn, no matter if before there was an abort.
      Returns:
      the first player in the queue

    • commonOBJTesting

      public int[] commonOBJTesting(Player nowPlaying)
      Test the common goal
      Parameters:
      nowPlaying - , who is playing
      Returns:
      result[0] means the success of the goal: -1 -> NOT MADE 1 -> MADE THE FIRST 2 -> MADE THE SECOND 3 -> MADE BOTH result[1] means the number of players that has made THE FIRST OBJECT result[2] means the number of players that has made THE SECOND OBJECT

    • detectEndGame

      public int detectEndGame()
      This method will know how many turn we need to made before the end
      Returns:
      the index in the queue of the second player

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner()
      Search the max number of points
      Returns:
      the winner of the game

    • calculateADJ

      public void calculateADJ()
      Will interrogate the model to calculate the adjacent of the same types of tiles.
